client.name: Italian National School for Personal Training
client.description: SNPT is the italian leading school that trains personal trainers with scientific method.

description: I developed the website of the school that allow students to subscribe and pay for courses and workshops. In addition, I also developed the entire back office application and the API layer using Ruby On Rails. 100% of the company earnings come from this system.

This was the first project I made using React. There were no CRA or boilerplates yet (when I started this, the prophet Dan Abramov didn’t work at Facebook yet), so it’s bundled with Webpack and Gulp and deployed with Capistrano.
